content.help: The percent chance that a legendary item or mod will be a weapon instead of armor. Does not affect containers.

content.text: Fallback to creating legendary weapons and armor for unrecognized enemies
content.help: If an enemy type isn't recognized by the mod, add a legendary item like the base game would

content.text:
1. Equipment settings affect enemies who carry their own weapons and armor.
  2. Containers settings affect boss trunks and safes that can contain legendary items.
  3. Effects settings affect all places standard legendary effects are used. This includes legendary items in containers and used by people, trinkets from ghouls, and legendary mods from robots.
Chance of adding a new legendary weapon
content.help: The percent chance that if the enemy's weapon is going to be made legendary, it will be a new weapon from the legendary leveled lists

content.text: Chance of adding a new legendary armor piece
content.help: The percent chance that if the enemy's armor is going to be made legendary, it will be new armor from the legendary leveled lists
If an equipped weapon should be made legendary but none are eligible, generate a new one instead of making legendary armor
If an equipped armor piece should be made legendary but none are eligible, generate a new one instead of making a legendary weapon

content.text: Enemies are able to wear more types of equipment than can normally become legendary. By default, this equipment will never be made legendary, but these settings allow you to make them eligible. Note that many of these items likely do not have naming rules for legendary effects, so you will have to read their description to know what the effect does.

content.help: Anything that can be upgraded with ballistic weave. May overlap with some of the other categories.
Mostly helmets and gas masks, but includes a few hats and hoods (Keyword: ArmorBodyPartHead)
Standard cloth hats (Keyword: ArmorTypeHat)
(Keyword: ArmorBodyPartEyes)
Includes clothing exclusive to dogs as well as bandanas (Keyword: ClothingDogmeat)

content.text: Power Armor to the People Not Detected
content.help: The Power Armor setting shouldn't be used if PAttP is detected
Do not use if using Power Armor to the People - change the Legendary Effects in that mod's settings
The percent chance that a boss trunk will contain a legendary item
The percent chance that a safe with a Master lock will contain a legendary item
The percent chance that a safe with an Expert lock will contain a legendary item

content.text: Minimum Player Level for Legendary Items
content.help: Containers can't have legendary items until the player reaches this level

content.text: These settings may drastically alter the game's balance or could result in enemies visually unequipping and equipping their armor shortly after you see them. They can be fun, but use at your own discretion.
Maximum number of legendary items per legendary enemy
content.help: A random number of legendaries between 1 and this value will be added to each legendary enemy

content.text: Chance of normal enemies getting legendary items
content.help: Useful if you are using mods that give normal and legendary enemies different equipment
